properties.AdvisoryDescription: Time Restriction: 6:00am - 10:00pm - Monday to Friday; 8:00am - 5:00pm - Saturday; Truck Travel is not permitted on Sundays and Statutory Holidays

properties.RouteType: Designated Municipal Truck Route with Restrictions
properties.Bylaw: Commercial Transport Procedures Manual, Chapt. 3, Sec. 3.8.4
properties.AdvisoryDescription: OS-OW Vehicle Restriction - Maximum overall dimensions and weight (inclusive of load): Width = 5.0 m; Length = 46 m; Height = 4.88 m; GVW = 80,000 kg. Requests for extraordinary loads over 64,000 kg to 80,000 kg (with an appropriate permit) require approval from CVSE and the bridge partnership contractor
